TestIATIDatastore.test_api_output_filety.desc:
Confirm the datastore returns data of the requested filetype.

The test is conducted based on the data returned in the
`Content-Type` response header. E.g.:

    Content-Type: application/xml; charset=utf-8
TestIATIDatastore.test_api_output_filety.error_msg:
self = <test_datastore.TestIATIDatastore object at 0x7f2f35048a58>
expected_content_type = 'application/xml'

    @pytest.mark.parametrize("expected_content_type", ["application/xml", "application/json", "text/csv"])
    def test_api_output_filetype(self, expected_content_type):
        """
        Confirm the datastore returns data of the requested filetype.
    
        The test is conducted based on the data returned in the
        `Content-Type` response header. E.g.:
    
            Content-Type: application/xml; charset=utf-8
        """
        file_extension = expected_content_type.split("/")[1]
        loaded_request = self.loaded_request_from_test_name("Datastore download: {}".format(file_extension.upper()))
    
>       content_type = loaded_request.headers["content-type"]

global_consistency.desc: Consistency of various top level figures across IATI websites.

TestGlobalConsistency.test_activity_coun.desc: Test to ensure activity counts are consistent within the dashboard.

TestGlobalConsistency.test_unique_vs_tot.desc:
Test to ensure unique activity counts within the dashboard are not higher
than the overall activity counts.

TestGlobalConsistency.test_activity_coun.desc:
Test to ensure the activity count is consistent, within a margin of error,
between the registry and the IATI Standard homepage.

TestGlobalConsistency.test_activity_file.desc:
Test to ensure the unique activity file count is above a specified minumum value.
This checks both the dashboard and registry.
Test to ensure activity file counts are consistent within the dashboard.

Test to ensure the activity file count is consistent, within a margin of error,
between the registry and dashboard.

TestGlobalConsistency.test_org_file_coun.desc:
Test to ensure the organisation file count is above a specified minumum value.
This checks both the dashboard and registry.
Test to ensure organisation file counts are consistent within the dashboard.

TestGlobalConsistency.test_organisation_.desc:
Test to ensure the activity file count is consistent, within a margin of error,
between the registry and dashboard.

TestGlobalConsistency.test_publisher_cou.desc:
Test to ensure the publisher count is above a specified minumum value.
This checks both the dashboard and registry.
Test to ensure organisation file counts are consistent within the dashboard.

Test to ensure the publisher count is consistent, within a margin of error,
between the registry and dashboard.

Test to ensure the publisher count is consistent, within a margin of error,
between the registry and query builder.

Test to ensure the publisher count is consistent, within a margin of error,
between the registry and the IATI Standard homepage.
